ygData.subject: Re: Memory Blur
ygData.msgSnippet: the way mem blur has worked for me is thatit clears the MOBs entire hate list. whoever it is chasing, it will leave alone if the person is far enough away or
ygData.messageBody:
the way mem blur has worked for me is thatit clears the MOBs entire hate
list. whoever it is chasing, it will leave alone if the person is far
enough away or if it wasnt aggro in the first place (aviaks being an example).

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 27th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
Qoronita, 7th level Erudite Enchantress on Cazic-Thule
(let's see who reaches 30 first, heh)

>
>i must admit, i enjoyed reading your story, and you have my regards for your
>death, but from my understanding of the spell, it just wipes YOU from the
>Mob's hate list, untill later when we get that "Blanket of Forgetfulness"
>spell which i think wipes all members in your party or all creatures in the
>AOE.
>
>-Aeramus Brainblaster (bristlebane)
>
>
